Room.Name: Trantor's Workshop
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the workshop of Trantori the High Invoker.
Room.LongDescription: Trantori receives the fine jewelry made by the elves and casts his magic on each piece before it is put in the display case outside. The speciality of the shop is magical jewelry, and Trantori and the Chief Jeweler both contribute to the final product. You may purchase from the elven maid in the sales room.
